title: Eggplant Burgers
ingredients: 1  eggplant, peeled and sliced into 3/4-inch rounds
method: Step 1: Place eggplant slices onto a microwave-safe plate. Microwave until the centers are cooked, about 5 minutes.
Step 2: Melt margarine in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Fry eggplant slices until lightly toasted on each side. Place a cheese slice onto each eggplant and cook until melted.
Step 3: Place eggplant slices onto hamburger buns. Top with lettuce, tomato, onion slices, and pickles, then dress with ketchup, mayonnaise, and mustard.
